duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage office staffing, operations, and logistics for multiple offices with support from Associate Team Leaders
Create and implement office-level growth plans and client growth targets, including developing local partnerships and managing office community involvement
Recruit and interview candidates for office associate positions
Conduct performance reviews and resolve associate issues, as well as address performance concerns
Build a engaging team environment by training and coaching associates while holding them accountable to SOPs and recognizing outstanding contributions
Lead daily team meetings and communicate essential information to tax office associates
Create and ensure accurate timekeeping, as well as labor management for staff in all offices
Travel between the offices as required
May prepare tax returns, as needed

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a related field, or high school diploma with the equivalent combination of experience
